Since participating in the patient program, do you feel that you understand your disease better?\n (1 = no change, 3 = slightly better, 5 = full understanding)
Since participating in the patient program, do you feel that yur condition is better managed and your quality of life has improved?\n (1 = no change, 3 = slightly improved, 5 = greatly improved)
